name: Elemental Mages
description:
Story:
The Amulett of Yendor has been stolen by evil creatures. Four young Mages go on the journey to recover it.

Controls:
WASD/Arrow-Keys - Move
E/SPACE            - Action
X/ESCAPE        - Pause/Back

Requirements(included with the builds):
Python 3.5 (python.org)
pygame 1.9 (pygame.org)

License:
Code: GPL3+
Graphics: CC0
SFX: CC0 - taken from opengameart.org(https://opengameart.org/content/512-sound-effects-8-bit-style)
